metadata.purpose: Ready-to-apply weight adjustments for hagen fingerprint system

recommended_layer_weights.comment: Revised based on diagnostic and taste analysis

increase.rationale: Top predictor of preference; sustained engagement is key
2nd strongest predictor despite low conscious awareness
Creativity valued; aligned with qualitative notes

decrease.rationale: NEGATIVE predictor; flashy hooks signal desperation
Heavily discussed but doesn't predict preference
Weak signal; cutsPerMinute is better proxy

neutral.rationale: Weak positive; audioQuality alone is stronger

new_signals_to_add.name: narrative_coherence
new_signals_to_add.rationale: Supports top predictor (attentionRetention); captures story flow quality

new_signals_to_add.name: production_polish
new_signals_to_add.rationale: Composite of audio + visual intentionality; explains audio paradox

new_signals_to_add.name: performer_execution
new_signals_to_add.rationale: 50/50 split with premise per user; can elevate or kill content

new_signals_to_add.name: payoff_quality
new_signals_to_add.rationale: 40.6% notes discuss; earned vs cheap distinction matters

hard_filters_before_scoring.comment: These should FILTER OUT before soft scoring

filters.name: content_type_relevance
filters.rationale: Don't compare interview content against sketch comedy

filters.name: environment_compatibility
filters.rationale: Rooftop bar can't use kitchen content

filters.name: replicability_feasibility
filters.logic: video.replicability.actor_count <= brand.team_size AND video.replicability.equipment_needed subset of brand.equipment_available
filters.rationale: Solo operator can't replicate team content

filters.name: risk_tolerance
filters.rationale: Family restaurant won't do edgy content
